bach.SeriesBoolean¶

class bach.SeriesBoolean(engine, base_node, index, name, expression, group_by, sorted_ascending=None)[source]¶

A Series that represents the Boolean type and its specific operations

Boolean Series can be used to create complex truth expressions like: ~(a & b ^ c), or in more human readable form not(a and b xor c).

~a     not a (invert a)
a & b  a and b
a | b  a or b
a ^ b  a xor b

Type Conversions

Boolean Series can be created from int and string values. Not all conversions errors will be caught on conversion time. Some will lead to database errors later.

Methods

dtype_to_expression(source_dtype, expression)

INTERNAL: Give the sql expression to convert the given expression, of the given source dtype to the dtype of this Series.

supported_value_to_expression(value)

INTERNAL: Give the expression for the given value.
